Description:
Determine whether text outputted by JavaScript is properly
      copied.

Verify that you can save a form's data by right clicking on
      the form itself.

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a section for an
        Intro/tutorial for NS6.

Determine whether Creating web pages help content displays
        correctly

Determine that you can right click an image and save to your local
        drive.

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager
Determine if CSS pages print properly

Verify that panels appear highlighted when mouse is moved over
        them
Verify list of available remote panels
Verify that adding of a panel using javascript works
Tests to access this dialog from the menubar and keyboard.
Viewing page and frame source via context menu.
Click and drag thumb to scroll page
